Package twcore.core.events

Class Summary
ArenaJoined (S2C 0x02) Event called when a bot enters the arena.
ArenaList  
BallPosition (S2C 0x2E) Event fired when a player picks up a ball.
FileArrived (S2C 0x10) Event called when the bot finishes the download of a file.
FlagClaimed (S2C 0x13) Event called when a player picks up or runs over a flag.
FlagDropped (S2C 0x16) Event called when a player drops a flag they are carrying.
FlagPosition (S2C 0x12) Event called when a flag is dropped, reset, or otherwise put somewhere else on the map.
FlagReward (S2C 0x23) Event called when a team gets periodic flag points from holding them.
FlagVictory (S2C 0x14) Event called when a team wins a flag jackpot.
FrequencyChange (S2C 0x0D) Event fired when a player changes frequencies.
FrequencyShipChange (S2C 0x1D) Event called when player changes ship (and possibly frequency) +------------------------------+ | Offset Length Description | +------------------------------+ | 0 1 Type Byte | | 1 1 Ship Type | | 2 2 Player ID | | 4 2 Frequency | +------------------------------+ Since this is the only packet associated with ship changing, getting this doesn't necessarily mean that they changed frequency too.
InterProcessEvent Event class of the Inter-process Communication protocol of TWCore.
LoggedOn (S2C 0x31) Event fired when the login sequence completes.
Message (S2C 0x07) Event fired when a chat message is received.
PasswordPacketResponse (S2C 0x0A) Event fired when response to password packet is received.
PlayerBanner (S2C 0x1F) Event fired when a player changes their banner.
PlayerDeath (S2C 0x06) Event fired when a player dies.
PlayerEntered (S2C 0x03) Event fired when a player (or the bot if non-empty) enters the arena.
PlayerLeft (S2C 0x04) Event is fired when a player leaves an arena.
PlayerPosition  
Prize (S2C 0x08) Event fired when a player revceives a prize.
ScoreReset (S2C 0x1A) Event fired when a player's score is reset.
ScoreUpdate (S2C 0x09) Event fired whenever a player's score is changed.
SoccerGoal (S2C 0x0B) Event fired when a Soccer Goal is made.
SQLResultEvent Event used to return the ResultSet of an SQL background query.
SubspaceEvent  
TurfFlagUpdate (S2C 0x22) Event fired for each individual flag when the status of all turfs flags is updated.
TurretEvent (S2C 0x0E) Event called when a player attaches or detaches from another.
WatchDamage This class represents watchdamage packets.
WeaponFired
